result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Maquan D. McAllister

records.addlTxt: Assistant District Attorney Sydney Star appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Balistrieri.   Clerk HMcBride.  On state's motion, ct 2 is dismissed as well as the repeater enhancer in ct 1.  DE enters guilty plea to ct 1. Court finds DE guilty of ct 1.  State requests PSI.  SEH 11/30 1:30pm.  Writ to be prepared.

Assistant District Attorney Sydney Star appeared for the State.  No appearance by the Defendant.  Atty Balistrieri appears for DE.   Clerk HMcBride.  DE unable to appear by zoom from RCJ.  Atty Balistrieri states that the State has changed their offer and he now needs to discuss new offer with DE. Adjmt granted.  FPT 9/8 10am.   Bond continued.  DE shall appear in person for next hearing.
RCJ unable to accommodate zoom for 7/19 PTC - rescheduled to 8/15 2pm.
Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State.  No appearance by the Defendant.  Atty Balistrieri appears for DE.   Clerk HMcBride.   DE in custody in RCJ.   PTC 7/19 2pm.  Bond continued.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
***DE HAS UNTIL 4PM TODAY TO POST BOND OR DE MUST REPORT TO KENOSHA COUNTY SHERIFF TO BE TAKEN INTO CUSTODY***
  *Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  *Not to drive w/o VALID Driver's License.
Phoned JS at 154pm.   Spoke to Amanda/jk

149PM  Attorney Dan Tombasco appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Francesco Balistrieri.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Referred to Br.1 for further proceedings on June 23, 2022 at 02:30 pm.  Warrant vacated.  $1000  Cash Bond Set w/conditions as previously set (see bond entry).  Deft has until 4pm today to post bond or Deft must report to KSD to be taken into custody.  kmk
warrant sent to JS.

Bench Warrant
KPD21068576

Attorney Andrew Burgoyne appeared for the State.   No appearance by the Defendant.  Atty Balistrieri appears.    Clerk HMcBride.  DE's whereabouts unknown to DE.   Court issues BW $1000 CB and forfeits CB.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: of Judge - filed by Atty. Francesco Balistrieri (sent to br.3)  kmk

Defendant, Maquan D. McAllister, appeared with Attorney Francesco J Balistrieri.  Attorney Alexandra Kathleen Smathers appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found.  Case bound over.    DE requests substitution of Br 3; Br 1 assigned. Information filed, reading waived.  Not guilty plea entered.  Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on February 23, 2022 at 09:15 am.

01:23 PM  Attorney Zachary Brost appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Francesco Balistrieri.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 20 days; set before Commissioner on February 23, 2022 at 09:15 am.  Bond continued.  Conditions as previously set.  kmk
at the request of Atty Balistrieri, AIA is rescheduled from 01-19 to 02-03 at 1pm Intake.  DA notified.
$500 posted 01/13/22.  kmk
filed by Atty. Francesco Balistrieri  kmk

255PM  Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in custody but no appearance due to COVID.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for January 19, 2022 at 01:00 pm. $500 Temporary  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).  sg
